Palmer in this budget period has emerged as that character from Shakespeare who somehow , despite absolute randomness and exquisite incoherence in the delivery ( or perhaps because of it ) , cuts through the chaos .
He 's the character who manages to narrate the tragedy in ways the protagonists ca n't because they are too busy spinning their wheels in the court intrigue and foul murther .
